text: Mike Reilly (March 27, 1942 â€“ October 18, 2019) was a professional American football player. He played linebacker for six seasons for the Chicago Bears and Minnesota Vikings. He was born in Dubuque, Iowa. Reilly died on October 18, 2019 in Dubuque at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American football linebackers Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Minnesota Vikings players Category:Football players from Iowa Category:People from Dubuque, Iowa
